summary: This is an email from a sender with initials 'Si' to a recipient with initials 'alMIE>' (likely a US Attorney's Office in New York), with a copy to another USANYS recipient, regarding a revised draft of a UK Mutual Legal Assistance Treaty (MLAT) request. The email attaches a document draft that adds a document request section and more specific questions.

events.title: Revised UK MLAT Request Drafted
events.description: A revised draft of a UK Mutual Legal Assistance Treaty request is prepared and shared via email, adding a document request section and more specific questions.

keyFacts: An email dated March 26, 2020, discusses a revised draft of a UK MLAT request.
The revision adds a document request section and more specific questions, as raised in a prior email.
The correspondence is between parties with US Attorney's Office email addresses, indicating ongoing legal coordination in the Epstein case.
